END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT

This is an agreement between you and [Your Company Name] ("Company") for your use of [Your App Name] ("Application"). The Application is licensed to you, not sold.

1. LICENSE

Company grants you a limited, non-exclusive, nontransferable license to:

- Download, install, and use the Application for personal, non-commercial use on a single mobile device.
- Access and use the content and services made available through the Application.

2. TERM AND TERMINATION

This Agreement remains in effect until terminated by you or Company. Company may suspend or terminate this Agreement at any time for any reason.

3. USER DATA

Your use of the Application is subject to the Company's Privacy Policy, available at [insert URL to your privacy policy].

4. AMENDMENTS

Company may modify, suspend or discontinue the Application or any service connected to it at any time without notice or liability to you.

5. CONTENT AND SERVICES

The Application may provide access to the Company's website
